data.title: West Virginia University
data.meta_description: WVU is a family of distinctive campuses united by a single mission: to provide a quality and affordable education. No matter who you are, you’ll find your niche here.
data.text:
International Students

Are you from outside the U.S.? We have resources especially for you. Learn about our location and programs, find answers to common questions and connect with your counselor.

International Student Resources

Admitted Students

Already admitted? Find your next steps to enroll at WVU and how to contact us if you have questions.

Visit the Admitted Student Resources website

Families

Is your student admitted to WVU? Learn about next steps and how to connect with other families.

Visit the Family Resources website

It was a no brainer to attend WVU. The School of Dentistry has an incredible track record for training and producing top-tier clinicians. I knew WVU would provide me with an exceptional educational experience that would prepare me to enter private practice immediately following graduation. WVU was exactly where I was meant to be, and I couldn’t be happier with my decision!

Kristen Mullins

2024 Doctor of Dental Surgery graduate from Hurricane, WV
